description.value:
Requirements You are wielding a Samurai Weapon

You perform a special blow that cuts the soul of your victims. Make a Strike with the required weapon. If you hit, the target must attempt a @Check[will|against:class] saving throw, with a -2 penalty if the initial strike was a critical success. Regardless of the result of the Strike, you may then sheathe the required weapon, and can enter @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-adventures-in-etheirys.actions.Item.ymyhuyGwv8vEnLIH]{Iai Stance}.

Success The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} until the start of your next turn.

Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2} until the start of your next turn.

Critical Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 4} until the start of your next turn.
